word.item: Once upon a time, a mother, father, and a baby son all lived in a house.
And then, at one time the father went hunting in the bush as usual.
Then again, when the sun came up, the mother wanted to go to the garden with the baby.
She put the baby in the bag and went [to the garden].
Then she arrived at the garden.
While the baby was in the bag, she hung it in the tree.
and then it (the flying fox) came down
when it came down, it saw something in the bag
it was things in (the bag) that made noise
then, (it) saw that was a baby
then, it went for the another group of flying fox and called them to come here
they came around and saw it was a baby
one group of (flying fox) untie the bag on one side,
the other group untie it on the other side.
they took the baby away, who was inside the bag, to their village
The boy was crying but (they) don’t want (the baby) to cry.
The sun was there and the wind blew, .
and she didn't hear her son crying
she was doing the gardening all the time
And then one flying fox came around
He came around, flied around and looked for food,
When the sun is about to set.
when it flew down, it saw
the sound was coming from the bag hanging there.
It was unable to get it, so it left and called for other flying foxes to come.
they all came and gather around and saw that it was a child, so
some flying foxes went to the other side of the bag and untied it
the other group of flying fox went to the other side to untie it.
the child was inside the bag and they took it away with the bag
they took it to their place.
They didn't want the child to cry anymore.
some flying fox went and brought some ripe bananas, some group of flying fox went
and plenty of other things and fed the child and make him not cry
came to the road, she looked to where the child was hanging (she looked to where she leaft the child)
And then she couldn't go home.
because she said the husband will beat her
She also was thinking what to do to look for the child.
Slowly she went around searching for the child and then she came to some place, and she looked she saw that the place was only occupied by flying foxes.
And then, she looked and saw the bag where she carry the baby.
She said the child must been brought here.
And then she also went and stayed with the flying foxes there and flying foxes looked after the child.
And then people come and stayed there and people there are called the flying fox family. The family being there are still there.
